import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Asignar/Modificar/Renovar Plan a Compañía"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/config/{nit}/{dv}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Endpoint para asignar un plan a una compañía, modificar sus datos o renovar su suscripción.

**Nota:** Este endpoint es multifuncional (Configuración + Asignación de Plan).
Devuelve un `API_TOKEN` nuevo si la operación es exitosa, el cual debe usarse para futuras peticiones.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"nit","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"NIT de la empresa","example":"89008003"},{"in":"path","name":"dv","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"Dígito de verificación","example":"2"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"type_document_identification_id":{"type":"integer","description":"ID del tipo de documento de identidad","example":3},"type_organization_id":{"type":"integer","description":"ID del tipo de organización","example":2},"type_regime_id":{"type":"integer","description":"ID del tipo de régimen","example":2},"type_liability_id":{"type":"integer","description":"ID del tipo de responsabilidad","example":14},"type_plan_id":{"type":"integer","description":"ID del plan a asignar","example":1},"renew_plan":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indica si es una renovación de plan","example":true},"business_name":{"type":"string","description":"Razón social","example":"ALEXANDER OBANDO LONDONO"},"merchant_registration":{"type":"string","description":"Registro mercantil","example":"0000000-00"},"municipality_id":{"type":"integer","description":"ID del municipio","example":820},"address":{"type":"string","description":"Dirección","example":"CRA 21A NRO 11-25"},"phone":{"type":"integer","description":"Teléfono","example":3103891693},"email":{"type":"string","description":"Correo electrónico","example":"alexander_obando@hotmail.com"},"state":{"type":"boolean","description":"Estado de la compañía","example":true}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Configuración realizada exitosamente. Devuelve API Token.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
